name: Full HD
description:
A game for jam Devlauncher Jam 2021 - Winter Edition on the theme "Resolution".An unknown developer completed work on his game for jam, but found that he could not use Full HD resolution. Only very narrow or very wide screen resolutions are available to him.

Control:

WASD - moving.

F - Change Resolution.

Developers:

Alexandr Lazurenko - Game design and Programming

babosik - Graphical package
